definition: Qing or Ch'ing dynasty of imperial China (1644-1911)/surname Qing
clear/distinct/quiet/just and honest/pure/to settle or clear up/to clean up or purge

sentences.english: In no mood for things, boiling pot of tea, lean on the West window.
sentences.chinese: 無心於事，煮幾壺清茶，獨倚西窗。

sentences.english: Love is passing a cup of tea to teachers during the break.
sentences.chinese: 愛是課間休息時先生給老師送去的一杯清茶。

sentences.english: I’ve learned the simple pleasures of drinking a cup of unsweetened tea made from whole tea leaves.
sentences.chinese: 我已經領悟到了喝杯清茶的單純樂趣。

sentences.english: A cup of tea, emitting a refreshing scent.
sentences.chinese: 一杯清茶，散發出沁人心脾的清香。

sentences.english: Table has green tea, has the hands of Ascott.
sentences.chinese: 桌上有清茶，手中有雅詩。

definition: tea prepared in large quantity using inexpensive tea leaves
(fig.) to have a meeting with state security agents (to be warned to behave "responsibly")
biluochun or pi lo chun, a type of green tea grown in the Dongting Mountain region near Lake Tai 太湖[Tai4 Hu2], Jiangsu
dilute wine/insipid wine/I'm sorry the wine I offer you is so poor (humble)
